meanings.definition: Laws enacted by a legislative body.
meanings.sent1: The legislations passed by the government aim to protect citizens.
meanings.sent2: Studying the various legislations can help you understand your rights.
meanings.sent3: The legislations decided to have a dance-off to settle the dispute.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of legislations was a shield in the courtroom.
meanings.sent5: The impact of these legislations will shape our society for years to come.

meanings.definition: The act or process of making or enacting laws.
meanings.sent1: Understanding the legislations requires careful attention to detail.
meanings.sent2: The legislations put in place are crucial for maintaining order.
meanings.sent3: The legislations decided to take a break and have a picnic instead.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, speed is key in legislations.
meanings.sent5: The legislations were crafted with precision and foresight.

meanings.definition: The body of laws enacted by a legislative authority.
meanings.sent1: The legislations in place ensure fair treatment for all.
meanings.sent2: Compliance with legislations is essential for a functioning society.
meanings.sent3: The legislations threw a surprise party for the citizens.
meanings.sent4: Navigating through the maze of legislations can be challenging.
meanings.sent5: The weight of these legislations rests on the shoulders of lawmakers.
